website_summaries.verdict: Merrell Moab FST undeniably made consumers pleased with its features and benefits. As a reasonably priced hiking shoe, it was able to deliver comfort, support and a spacious toe box in a lightweight build. Its breathability enabled users to use it even in warmer conditions. Its traction and stability also received approval from users. It even has an accurate sizing and does not require a break-in period. No matter how exceptional this shoe was, it still had a flaw. The weak construction of the outsole irked a few.
pros: A high percentage of Merrell stalwarts approved of the Moab FST's accurate sizing
They noted that there was no need to go a half size down or up to get the right fit
Several pleased users praised it for its virtually no breaking-in period
Many were ecstatic with how comfortable this hiker was
Merrell Moab FST was stable on a variety of ground conditions, as mentioned in quite a lot of consumer reviews
A couple of owners were so charmed with the hiking shoe
They even bought a second pair
Being a lightweight footgear, the Moab FST delighted a handful of hikers as they felt like they were not wearing any shoe at all
Some wearers were thrilled with the traction of this day hiking footwear
It was an excellent value for the money, according to a considerable number of buyers
Many users appreciated it right out-of-the-box comfort
The Moab FST was supportive, as commented by a huge number of wearers
The majority loved how breathable the shoe was
They said that they were able to use it in warmer conditions without leaving their feet hot
The roomy toe box has taken the attention of numerous owners
Based on their reviews, they did not feel any pinching or straining on their feet
cons: Quite a few Merrell Moab FST buyers were disappointed with its quality
They noted that after a couple of months, the outsole peeled away from the upper

customer_reviews.title: I would consider it a comfortable fit and comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: This shoe has a generous toe box and a bit of cushioning. I would consider it a comfortable fit and comfortable to wear. I would have given these at least 4 stars, in fact I was ready to order another color but I wore them in wet grass 4 times and my feet were wet. The first time only my left foot was wet, the next 3 times both feet were wet. I don’t know if I just got a bad pair, maybe, so I wouldn’t say you shouldn’t try them, especially with Amazons great return policy, which is what I did, return them.
customer_reviews.author: Richard B.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic shoe. It's great for hot climates, as the mesh allows your feet to move, stretch & breath. The toe box is roomy with no pinching and fit is perfect! I have mobility issues on my left side and the shoes are comfy & supportive. The vibram soles gain plenty of traction in dry and mild rain environments however I haven't tried them in full blown wet weather.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Kira H

customer_reviews.title: like may of you
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Merrell Moabs for years, like may of you. I tried this style and was not happy due to the tight fit over the top of my foot. I returned them to exchange for regular Moabs.
customer_reviews.author: CaptBuddy

customer_reviews.title: Sole came unglued
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable and durable EXCEPT that the soles have pieces glued on and on both shoes a section has come unglued. I was able to re-glue but that should not be necessary. I have seen this problem mentioned in another review.
customer_reviews.author: Roy C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Quite comfortable! Would buy again! Rigid yet pliable. Very sturdy shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Rowdeo Cwby

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe. My husband has Merrells in 12
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. My husband has Merrells in 12.5 and 13 and he likes both.
customer_reviews.author: MKAY

customer_reviews.title: They are really good, used first time for a short 6 miles ...
customer_reviews.text: They are really good, used first time for a short 6 miles hike and they were surprisingly comfortable considering it was the first time I used them.
customer_reviews.author: Renato

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes. Comfortable straight out of the box. Fits as expected.
customer_reviews.author: gary shaw

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: shifty shoe loose fit but, it was only the first time hiking in them.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, especially at the price I got them at
customer_reviews.author: Scott D. Pristas

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these shoes but I had to return this pair because they were too narrow in the toe area. I ordered a 9 1/2 and the fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: rmar

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fit
customer_reviews.text: These are one of the best fitting shoes I have ever bought. As a man with size 14 feet it is often hard to find shoes which fit as well as these do!
customer_reviews.author: Steve S

customer_reviews.title: Shoe seemed to fit my foot really good, but I experienced knee pain everytime I wore ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoe seemed to fit my foot really good, but I experienced knee pain everytime I wore them. I have had one pair of Merrill shoes that had no issues, so this surprised me. I had to return these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Their comfortable sneakers. However
customer_reviews.text: Their comfortable sneakers. However, if I ordered 12 1/2 which is my size it would've been small. These sneakers tend to be narrow type of sneakers. If you so happen to have a wide foot these would be better a size larger the normal.
customer_reviews.author: Tino

product_meta.title: Merrell Men's Moab FST Low Rise Hiking Boots
product_meta.description: These Moab FST shoes from Merrell feature mesh and TPU uppers and breathable mesh lining. They also feature bellows tongue keeps debris out and moulded nylon arch shank. Merrell air cushion in the heel absorbs shock and adds stability. Merrell M Select FIT.ECO blended EVA contoured foot bed with organic odour control. Vibram MegaGrip outsole provides the best combination of stickiness and durability for sure traction on both wet and dry surfaces.
feature_bullets: Outer material: leather, mesh and TPU.
